tips.title: How to Plant a Window Box
tips.description: Window boxes add charm to any home. With the right plants and proper care, you can create a stunning display that lasts all season long.

tips.title: Choosing the Right Soil
tips.description: Soil is the foundation of a healthy garden. Learn how to select the best soil for your plants.

essentials.description: Natural fertilizer for healthy plant growth.

accessories.description: Add beauty to your garden with colorful pebbles.

books.title: Small Space Gardening
books.description: Learn how to make the most of limited gardening space.

about.description: Green Groves is dedicated to helping gardening enthusiasts grow beautiful plants with ease. Our team of experts provides guidance on creating stunning gardens in limited spaces like balconies, terraces, and small yards. Founded in 2025, we're committed to spreading the joy of gardening to urban dwellers and apartment residents worldwide.
